title: 'If Pakistan captain wants, we'll play him': SKY after Agha's comment on Abhishek
content: Pakistan captain Salman Ali Agha hopes India's Abhishek Sharma recovers for their World Cup clash, stating they wish to compete against a full-strength Indian side.  India's Suryakumar Yadav responded humorously to the sentiment. Sharma, a top-ranked T20I batter, has a strong record against Pakistan, making his potential return significant for the highly anticipated match.

title: 'Victory is not declared by mere rhetoric': CDS Gen Anil Chauhan takes swipe at Pakistan
content: Chief of Defence Staff General Anil Chauhan emphasized that "actual vijay lies in demonstrated evidence," referencing India's counterterror actions. He stressed that victory isn't built on rhetoric but on tangible outcomes like damaged terror infrastructure and dysfunctional air defence systems, urging a sober assessment of India's defense preparedness for future challenges.

title: Russia killed opposition leader Navalny using dart frog toxin, 5 European nations say
content: Five European nations confirmed Alexei Navalny was poisoned with a lethal toxin, accusing the Russian state. Laboratory analysis detected epibatidine, a powerful poison not naturally found in Russia. The countries will report Moscow to the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons for an alleged breach of the Chemical Weapons Convention.

title: Horrific Valentine‚Äôs Day murder in Noida: Man shoots woman inside car, then turns gun on himself
content: A man and a woman were discovered dead from gunshot wounds inside a locked car in Noida's Sector 107. Police found a pistol in the man's hand, suggesting a possible murder-suicide. The deceased have been identified, and their families have been notified. Investigations are ongoing to determine the exact sequence of events.

title: US FTC to probe Microsoft's business practices
content: US regulators are intensifying their probe into Microsoft's alleged monopolistic practices in cloud computing and AI. The FTC is investigating if the tech giant hinders rivals by scrutinizing licensing and bundling of services like Copilot. This mirrors past concerns raised by Google, though their EU complaint was withdrawn.

title: Not India vs Pakistan anymore, it's all about Usman Tariq‚Äôs bowling action in Colombo
content: Ahead of the India-Pakistan blockbuster, the spotlight has shifted from rivalry to scrutiny, with Usman Tariq‚Äôs bowling action dominating discourse and unsettling both batters and press rooms in Colombo.

title: Operation Hawkeye: US forces conduct strikes on over 30 IS targets in Syria
content: US forces have intensified pressure on ISIS in Syria with 10 strikes hitting over 30 targets, including infrastructure and weapons depots, between February 3-12. This follows earlier strikes and is part of Operation Hawkeye, a retaliatory response to a deadly December ambush. Over 50 terrorists have been neutralized, with hundreds of precision munitions deployed to degrade ISIS capabilities.

title: After CEO asked employees to stop coding, Nvidia engineers get access to OpenAI's Codex
content: Nvidia has deployed OpenAI's Codex AI coding tool to all 30,000 engineers, marking a significant enterprise rollout. CEO Jensen Huang's mandate to automate tasks with AI is driving this adoption, with engineers praising the tool's ability to handle complex workflows and maintain context.

title: 'Politics of negativity': Piyush Goyal rejects Rahul's concerns over India-US trade deal
content: Union minister Piyush Goyal attacked Rahul Gandhi over the India-US trade deal, accusing him of "foolishness" and "sabotaging India's growth." Goyal countered Gandhi's claims about hurting farmers and exporters, highlighting the potential for textile market growth and job creation. He also pointed out that Gandhi's party initiated policies allowing duty-free import of raw materials for exports.

title: Pakistan captain adds fuel to handshake controversy - 'We‚Äôll find that out'
content: Pakistan captain Salman Ali Agha reignited the handshake controversy ahead of the India clash, saying he hopes for sportsmanship but adding, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll find that out tomorrow.‚Äù India arrived in Colombo to a festive welcome and will train separately from Pakistan. Key Indian players are set to feature, with spin expected to play a big role. Agha had earlier criticised India‚Äôs past handshake refusal, calling it bad for the game and young fans.

title: Hardik Pandya inks heartfelt Valentine's Day 'M' tattoo for girlfriend Mahieka ‚Äì Watch
content: Cricketer Hardik Pandya celebrated his love for girlfriend Mahieka Sharma with a unique tattoo featuring two leopards, symbolizing their strength and partnership.  This meaningful ink, conceptualized with artists, marks a special Valentine's surprise.  Pandya also showcased his prowess on the field, delivering a stellar performance against Namibia with both bat and ball, earning him Player of the Match.

title: Pitch report from Colombo: India vs Pakistan to be played on used surface
content: The highly anticipated India vs Pakistan clash on February 15 will be played on a used surface at the R Premadasa Stadium in Colombo, a factor that could significantly influence conditions and strategy in the marquee T20 World Cup encounter.

title: Sunny Deol hints at a title change of his upcoming movie 'Lahore 1947'
content: Fans of Sunny Deol are eagerly anticipating his next project, 'Lahore 1947', which is helmed by the talented Rajkumar Santoshi and produced by the legendary Aamir Khan. However, there's buzz in the air about a possible title change! This cinematic experience, inspired by a renowned play, is set to hit theaters in August. Read on to know more in detail

title: Cisco president Jeetu Patel says company will never hire these developers
content: Cisco's president Jeetu Patel mandates AI for all developers, aiming for half a dozen AI-coded products by 2026. This shift to spec-driven development sees human teams shrink, with AI agents tripling output. While embracing AI's potential, Cisco is investing heavily in security to prevent rogue agents, urging developers to master AI to stay relevant.

title: Under-construction metro pillar collapses in Mumbai's Mulund West; 1 dead
content: A section of an under-construction metro rail pillar collapsed onto an autorickshaw in Mulund West on Saturday afternoon, with three to four individuals feared injured. The incident occurred near the Johnson & Johnson company on LBS Road when a cement segment gave way during ongoing work. Rescue operations are underway, and the injured are being transported to a hospital.

title: 'Cleared by the ICC': Pakistan captain Agha backs 'trump card' Usman Tariq
content: Pakistan captain Salman Ali Agha confirmed spinner Usman Tariq has been cleared by the ICC, dismissing concerns over his bowling action ahead of the India clash. Agha emphasized Tariq's importance as a "trump card" and stated the player remains unaffected by the debate.

title: 'Power-sharing is essential': Cong presses DMK again after Stalin's red line in Tamil Nadu
content: Congress seeks more seats from DMK for the Tamil Nadu assembly elections. MP Manickam Tagore stated power sharing is essential for governance. DMK leader RS Raja Kannappan earlier claimed DMK would contest 170 seats. Formal alliance talks are set to begin on February 22. The INDIA bloc remains united despite BJP's efforts.

title: 'Don't know if they're serious': Rubio on Russia's intent to end Ukraine war
content: US secretary of state Marco Rubio expressed doubts about Russia's commitment to ending the Ukraine war, even as new peace talks loom.  Speaking at the Munich Security Conference, Rubio emphasized the need for "seriousness and reciprocity" from allies, while also reassuring Europe of strong transatlantic ties and a desire for a "reinvigorated alliance."

title: Doctors explain the signs of magnesium deficiency that can show up on your face and eyes
content: Subtle facial changes, like persistent eyelid twitches and dark circles, might signal magnesium deficiency, experts reveal. While common lifestyle factors often cause these, a lack of this vital mineral can impact nerve signaling and muscle relaxation. Doctors advise paying attention to these signs and consulting a professional for proper diagnosis and dietary adjustments.

title: Vikram Bhatt faces fresh non-payment allegations from '1920: Horrors of the Heart' crew
content: Filmmaker Vikram Bhatt and his wife received temporary bail in a Rs 30 crore fraud case. Following casting director Parag Chadha's allegations of non-payment, a crew member revealed she's owed Rs 20 lakh for her work on '1920: Horrors of the Heart'. Despite promises, significant dues remain unpaid, impacting the livelihoods of those involved.

title: Considering retirement at 28, Shadley is now top wicket-taker at 2026 T20 WC
content: Shadley van Schalkwyk has been the standout bowler at the T20 World Cup 2026, leading the wicket charts with 11 wickets in three matches. The USA all-rounder impressed against India and Pakistan, using smart variations to pick key wickets. His resurgence comes after years of struggles, injuries, and career setbacks, which shaped his mental toughness. Now 37, Schalkwyk is enjoying peak form and inspiring USA‚Äôs strong campaign.

title: 'Show that PM CARES': Congress books flight tickets for PM Modi to visit Manipur
content: Congress leader Pawan Khera criticized PM Modi for visiting Assam instead of Manipur, which has been experiencing unrest. Khera shared mock flight tickets from Guwahati to Imphal, urging the PM to visit the troubled state. This comes as Manipur faces renewed tensions and violent protests.

title: ‚ÄòLost control at 160 kmph‚Äô: How Bengaluru joyride turned fatal for 6 teens
content: A tragic accident occurred near Kambalipura Gate. A speeding SUV collided with a bike and then a truck. Seven lives were lost, including six students and a bike rider. The SUV was severely damaged. Another car later hit debris from the crash. The incident happened early Friday morning.

title: Big push for Assam: PM Modi inaugrates Rs 5,450 crore worth projects
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi launched a Rs 5,450 crore infrastructure drive in Assam, inaugurating the Kumar Bhaskar Varma Setu, a vital six-lane bridge, and the National Data Centre for the North Eastern Region.  He also inaugurated the Indian Institute of Management Guwahati and flagged off 225 electric buses, boosting connectivity, digital infrastructure, and higher education across the Northeast.

title: '$100,000 deal': What US justice department reveals about Pannun murder plot
content: An Indian national, Nikhil Gupta, has admitted guilt in a US court for orchestrating a $100,000 murder-for-hire plot against a US citizen. Prosecutors allege an Indian government employee directed the scheme targeting a Sikh separatist leader. Gupta's arrest in the Czech Republic led to his extradition and subsequent plea.

title: Happy valentine's day: 51 best valentine's day wishes and messages
content: Valentine's Day 2026 is here, a perfect occasion to celebrate love in all its forms. Whether you're expressing affection to a girlfriend, boyfriend, husband, or wife, the article offers a collection of heartfelt wishes. It also acknowledges singles embracing self-love and those celebrating with friends and family, encouraging everyone to pause and connect.

title: 'Bigger threat than any': Moeen Ali warns Pakistan ahead of India match
content: Former England all-rounder Moeen Ali warned Pakistan that India‚Äôs spinners, especially Kuldeep Yadav and Varun Chakravarthy, could be a major threat in the T20 World Cup clash. India received a festive welcome in Colombo, with Arshdeep Singh‚Äôs dance going viral. The team will rely on key batters like Hardik Pandya, Ishan Kishan and Tilak Varma, while Varun could be crucial on spin-friendly pitches.

title: US used Anthropic‚Äôs Claude AI model in Venezuela raid that captured Maduro: Report
content: Anthropic's AI model Claude was reportedly used in the US military operation that captured former Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro. The mission involved bombing sites in Caracas, with Maduro apprehended in an early January raid. This deployment highlights growing questions about AI's role in military contexts, despite Anthropic's usage policies prohibiting violence facilitation.

title: India's air power on display! PM Modi lands at Dibrugarh emergency landing facility, attends IAF show
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in Assam for a day-long visit, commencing with an aerial display by the Indian Air Force. He is set to inaugurate the Kumar Bhaskar Varma Setu, the first extradosed bridge in Northeast India, and the temporary campus of IIM Guwahati.

title: B'desh polls: Hardliner Jamaat's gains along India border set off security concerns
content: Alarm bells ring for India as hardline Jamaat-e-Islami and allies secure significant wins in Bangladesh border regions. This surge, the party's best in over two decades, fuels concerns about radicalization on both sides of the India-Bangladesh frontier. BJP highlights the historical ties between Jamaat and Pakistan, raising security anxieties for New Delhi.

title: ISL 2025-26: How FanCode's sub-licensing move solves the broadcast puzzle
content: Hours before kickoff, FanCode officially sub-licensed ISL‚Äôs TV rights to Sony Sports Network, opting for wider reach over exclusivity. The Dream Sports-owned digital-first platform prioritised accessibility and collaboration, ensuring broader audience coverage. The move underlines a growing trend of partnerships, not competition, may be key to expanding sports viewership in India.

title: Slam dunks, global games, emerging stars: What to watch on All-Star Weekend
content: Our experts break down what to watch over the 2026 NBA All-Star Weekend and their picks for contests, competitions and more.

title: 'I blew it': Malinin falls twice in Olympic shocker
content: American sensation "Quad God" Ilia Malinin fell twice in a disastrous free skate Friday night, allowing Kazakhstan's Mikhail Shaidorov to claim a stunning gold medal.

title: Wroblewski calls out officiating after chippy U.S. win
content: Abbey Murphy was once again in the middle of the action, drawing and taking penalties as the U.S. women's hockey team cruised to a 6-0 win over Italy that got "a little spicy" and led to coach John Wroblewski sounding off on Olympic officiating.

title: 76ers' Edgecombe named MVP in Rising Stars win
content: Philadelphia rookie VJ Edgecombe led Team Vince to victory in the Rising Stars event at NBA All-Star Weekend on Friday night.

title: Baylor 1B's 3-grand slam game ties NCAA record
content: Tyce Armstrong made history in his Baylor debut by hitting three grand slams in a 15-2 win over New Mexico State on Friday night. He became only the second college player to pull off that feat.

title: WR Kingston no longer at BYU after rape charge
content: Brigham Young University says its standout wide receiver Parker Kingston is no longer a student there after he was arrested this week on a first-degree felony rape charge.

title: Tensions flare over curling cheating allegations
content: The often-sedate world of curling has gotten heated at the Winter Olympics as cheating allegations and audible curse words overshadowed a feisty match between two of the best men's teams.

title: Source: D-backs keeping Gallen on 1-year deal
content: Zac Gallen is staying with the Diamondbacks after agreeing to a one-year deal worth $22.05 million, a source confirmed to ESPN.

content: Wrexham achieved another landmark moment in their meteoric rise after reaching the last 16 of England's FA Cup for the first time since 1997.

content: Impress your friends by repeating ESPN's easy-to-learn fun facts about the Great American Race ahead of this year's edition of the Daytona 500.

title: Who's really fastest in 2026? F1's new rules are confusing the pecking order -- and the drivers
content: Formula 1's new era was always going to bring questions, but its first week of serious running has raised more than most. With one more preseason test in Bahrain still to come, ESPN makes sense of a fascinating three days in Sakhir.

content: MLB fans are angry -- and players and owners are, too. What did this offseason mean for baseball's coming labor strife?

content: All the rankings, projections, cheat sheets, strategy and analysis you need for the 2026 fantasy baseball season.

content: We'll see 32 picks in Round 1, but which prospects have actually earned a first-round grade? There are currently 11 in the 2026 class. Here's the updated list.

title: Premier League superlatives: The 25 best and worst players at different skills
content: Who's the Premier League's fastest player? The slowest? Best passer? The worst? And more. Here are 25 superlatives from different skills.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man City, Chelsea want Brentford's Igor Thiago
content: Man City, Chelsea and Bayern Munich are tracking Brenford's Igor Thiago, while Man United look to move on Andr√© Onana. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Man 'Dies' In Meghalaya Mine Explosion, Returns Home After His Last Rites
content: A mine worker who was among the 31 declared dead in the devastating explosion in an illegal rat-hole coal mine in East Jaintia Hills in Meghalaya has returned home alive, days after his last rites were performed.

title: Madras High Court Orders Probe Into Bribe Allegations In Gold Fraud Case
content: The Madras High Court has ordered a vigilance inquiry into allegations that a senior lawyer received Rs 50 lakh from accused persons, allegedly to be paid to a judge for securing favourable orders in a gold trade fraud case.

title: Chaos To Coaching: How AI Is Helping Slash Road Fatalities In India
content: As India prepares for the upcoming AI Impact Summit, a quiet revolution is unfolding across its 64-lakh-kilometre road network.

title: 6-Year-Old Dies 15 Days After Sister's Death, Mother Gave Them Rat Poison
content: Police in Punjab's Bathinda have arrested a woman for allegedly poisoning her two minor children. The suspect, believed to be involved in an extramarital affair, reportedly fed the children food laced with rat poison.

title: US Military Used Claude AI In Venezuela Operation To Capture Maduro: Report
content: The US military used artificial intelligence in its operation to capture Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro last month, according to a report by the Wall Street Journal.

title: Delhi Police Busts Fake Medicine Factory In Bihar, 9 Arrested
content: The Delhi Police have busted a fake medicine manufacturing unit in Bihar's Gaya, the second in the last week, and arrested one more accused linked to an interstate drug syndicate, an official said on Friday.

title: IIT Kanpur Technician Hangs Self After Argument With Fiance
content: A 28-year-old junior technician at the Indian Institute of Technology-Kanpur (IIT-K) on Saturday hanged herself to death inside the campus accommodation allegedly after disconnecting her phone with fiance.

title: Parliament Data Reveals Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh Lag In Drone Adoption
content: A written reply tabled in the Lok Sabha has brought fresh scrutiny to the pace of drone adoption in Madhya Pradesh and Chhattisgarh, even as the Centre claims to have significantly liberalised India's drone ecosystem.

title: 76-Year-Old Man Dies, 9 Injured In Bee Attack In Odisha
content: A 76-year-old man died and at least nine others were injured when a swarm of bees attacked them in Odisha's Kendrapara district, police said on Saturday.

title: 7 Years Of Pulwama: How India Cracked Case, Changed Anti-Terror Response
content: Seven years after Pulwama, Jaish-e-Mohammad chief Masood Azhar remains elusive, his freedom of movement curtailed. India's assertive retaliation strategy has forced him into hiding, stripping Pakistan of its erstwhile safe haven status.

title: 4 Killed As Car Plunges In Gorge In Himachal Pradesh: Cops
content: Four people, including a woman and her son, were killed and another sustained serious injuries when their car plunged into a deep gorge in Kinnaur, police said on Saturday.

title: CEO Jensen Huang Won't Attend India AI Impact Summit: Nvidia
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang will not be travelling to India next week for the India AI Impact Summit, which global technology industry and political leaders are likely to attend, the company said on Saturday.

title: India Set To Resume Work On Wular Barrage, Stalled By Indus Waters Treaty
content: Nine months after suspending the Indus Waters Treaty (IWT) following the Pahalgam attack, the Jammu and Kashmir government is set to resume work on the stalled Wular barrage. The project aims to regulate water storage from the Jhelum River.

title: How 'Project Empathy' Helps Preserve Nagaland's Oral History Collections
content: A project themed on empathy is bringing a positive change, without any fanfare, in Nagaland after it guided college students to return to their communities and engage in intimate conversations with elders.

title: 1 Killed, 3 Injured After Portion Of Mumbai Metro Pillar Falls On Vehicles
content: A portion of a pillar of the Mumbai Metro peeled off and fell on a road below in Mulund (West) today, killing one and leaving three others critically injured, officials said.

title: 'BJP' Makes Its Mark In Bangladesh Elections, Wins 1 Seat
content: In Bangladesh's 13th General Elections, the Bangladesh Jatiya Party (BJP) secured a single seat, with Andaleeve Rahman Partho winning from the Bhola-1 constituency.

title: 'Want Ties With India Based On Mutual Respect': Tarique Rahman's Top Aide To NDTV
content: The new Bangladesh government led by Tarique Rahman's BNP wants to build people-to-people ties with neighbouring India and strengthen bilateral relationship through trade and investments, a top aide of Rahman told NDTV.

title: Video: PM Modi Lands Aboard C-130J Aircraft On Assam Highway
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi made a historic landing at northeast's first emergency landing facility aboard C-130J aircraft in Assam's Moran, beginning his one-day tour of the state that is slated to go to polls soon.

title: "You Captured My Heart": Valentine's Day Message For Maduro From White House
content: The White House has released a series of politically charged digital cards for Valentine's Day on social media.

title: Tarique Rahman's Pakistan Test: Dhaka's Gameplan After Yunus Reset
content: With Tarique Rahman set to take over as the next Prime Minister of Bangladesh, all eyes would be on how he deals with Pakistan.

content: Party State secretary alleges failure to implement Super Six promises, flags lack of clarity on jobs, women assistance and irrigation funding

title: Arunachal Governor points out China‚Äôs long-term strategy along frontiers
content: During a seminar in Assam‚Äôs Tinsukia, Governor Lieutenant General (retd.) K.T. Parnaik describes the border State as a strategic buffer as well as a land of immense human, cultural and economic potential

title: Two Bengal academicians win A.K. Ramanujan Prize for translating Dalit woman poet‚Äôs works
content: The translated volume, I Belong to Nowhere, brings works of Dalit poet Kalyani Thakur Charal to global readers.

title: Health outlay rises 9.5% to ‚Çπ19,306 crore in Budget: Satya Kumar Yadav
content: Health Minister says the sector ranks fourth in allocations, with major funding for medical education, Dr. NTR Vaidya Seva Trust and Ayushman Bharat to strengthen public health systems

title: Three-day International Conference on Development and Democracy to open on Sunday in Thiruvananthapuram
content: Renowned economists, policy and planning experts and scholars from across the globe will participate in the event which aims to evolve a development perspective for Kerala for the period up to 2031

title: Andhra Pradesh on the path to recovery and growth, says Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: The government has presented the best possible budget under the prevailing circumstances, he says, adding that finances are being managed with the support of the Union government

title: Protest over inclusion of non-medical degrees for faculty appointment in medical colleges
content: The Kerala PSC had included non-medical Biochemistry postgraduates in the written examination and selection process for appointment towards the posts of Assistant Professor in Biochemistry in government medical colleges in the State

title: Budget balances welfare, growth and fiscal discipline: BJP
content: Party spokesperson says reduction in revenue and fiscal deficits despite higher expenditure reflects prudent financial management

title: Cabinet resolution hails shifting of PMO to Seva Teerth as 'confluence of history and future'
content: Reflecting the shift toward modern, service-oriented governance, the Cabinet resolved that these iconic buildings will become part of the 'Yuge-Yugeen Bharat National Museum', preserving India's civilisational legacy

title: A.P.‚Äôs public debt to reach ‚Çπ7.11 lakh crore in 2026‚Äì27; GSDP ratio steady at 36%
content: The government has initiated debt restructuring measures, renegotiating loans of ‚Çπ43,298 crore and securing annual savings of ‚Çπ327 crore, says Finance Minister

content: City Economic Regions will be developed around Visakhapatnam, Amaravati and Tirupati as key regional growth engines; NITI Aayog to lend expertise¬†

title: Union Cabinet clears ‚ÄòUrban Challenge Fund‚Äô for cities
content: Central assistance will cover 25% of project costs to build resilient cities, subject to raising minimum 50% of the project cost from the market, including municipal bonds, bank loans, and public-private partnership

title: Andhra Pradesh Tenant Farmers Association alleges neglect in State Budget
content: Says ‚Çπ6,650 crore Annadata Sukhibhava outlay excludes landless tenants; demands protective legislation, collateral free loans and ex gratia for families of those who died by suicide

title: KVMA to host VALVX-2026 industry exhibition in Hubballi from Feb. 18
content: The event is aimed at creating a triangular networking platform connecting manufacturers, suppliers, and sector-specific customers, says S.K. Awati, president of KVMA

content: The Minister says that Congress leaders who are making misleading statements about what he said in the Assembly will soon have to apologise; he reiterates that his statement was made strictly on the basis of documentary evidence

content: The accused, identified as Kiran Kumar, 34, allegedly misused his access to the locker keys and, during the absence of the branch manager, began siphoning off small quantities of pledged gold over a period of time

title: Kite festival marks colourful start to Hampi Utsav-2026
content: A large number of kite enthusiasts participated in the event, turning the skyline into a splash of colours with kites of varied shapes and sizes

title: Access to justice can't remain an abstract ideal reserved for legally empowered: CJI Surya Kant
content: ‚ÄúJudicial leadership cannot be confined to administrative authority or institutional hierarchy and must be understood as an intellectual and ethical orientation,‚Äù says CJI Kant

content: He said the objective of his demand is not political but to ensure that the truth behind the accident is established beyond doubt

title: Centre's nod for country's first underwater road-cum-rail tunnel in Assam historic milestone: CM
content: The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs, chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, approved the construction of the twin-tube underwater road-cum-rail tunnel between Gohpur and Numaligarh in Assam at a total capital cost of ‚Çπ18,662 crore

title: Watch: When the PM and LOP could not finish their speeches | Parliament budget session
content: The first half of the Budget session of the Parliament was a stormy one, to the point where PM Modi and Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi were not allowed to complete their speeches. There was also the controversy of the unpublished book of former Army chief Manoj Narwane, Hardeep Puri in the Epstein Files and the Indo-US trade deal.

title: Council for Historical Research, NoRKA-Roots to launch project to map migration profile of Keralites in Africa
content: The project aims to document, study, and preserve the historical and contemporary migration experiences of Keralites across African countries

title: AI Impact Summit: Supreme Court says advocates can appear through video conferencing from February 16-20
content: The apex court clarified that appearance through video conferencing shall be optional and all the Benches shall function in hybrid mode during the above period

title: Those opposing third term for Left trying to weaken the front, alleges P. Rajeeve
content: He alleged that this narrative was created by the Opposition to propagate an impression among the public that the Left should not be allowed to come back to power for the third consecutive time

title: AI Impact Summit to yield minimum 15 deliverables,  says IT Ministry official
content: Delegates from more than 100 countries to attend, deliverables aimed at tangible results, says MeitY.

title: Kerala writes to Centre to undertake feasibility study for RRTS
content: The State government has requested the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs to facilitate discussions with NCRTC, which implemented the Delhi-Meerut Regional Rapid Transit System, for developing a comprehensive RRTS framework

content: In a social media post, he said the Modi Government has neither protected the interests of cotton farmers nor that of textile exporters as a ‚Äòvisionary government‚Äô would have negotiated a deal that protected both and ensured prosperity for both the sectors

content: The decision was taken at a Cabinet meeting chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday (February 13, 2026)

title: A.P. Minister Atchannaidu presents agriculture budget in Legislative Assembly with an outlay of ‚Çπ53,753 crore
content: Promotion of natural farming, encouraging the adoption of digital practices, facilitating crop¬†diversification, reducing post-harvest losses and giving a fillip to food processing were mentioned as thrust areas

title: Airtel says it added 220 Tbps to India subsea cable bandwidth
content: The telco has emerged as the largest investor in subsea cable infrastructure, where India‚Äôs capacities lag behind many developed countries, in spite of a massive 5G rollout

title: Congress neglected North East, promoted insurgency in Assam during its rule: PM at Guwahati rally
content: Addressing the rally, the Prime Minister gave credit to party workers for BJP‚Äôs success and added that ‚ÄúWe believe in organisational strength‚Äù

title: Patient escapes from mental health centre in Thrissur, attacks three before recaptured
content: The accused, identified as Suraj, 31, a Nepal native, had been brought to the Thrissur Mental Health Centre from Aluva

title: CM Adityanath calls for FIRs against those filing false reports during investigations
content: CM Yogi Adityanath stated that every case must be resolved only after a thorough and impartial investigation, insisting that any negligence or laxity is unacceptable.

title: What is Seva Teerth? Everything You Need to Know About the New PMO Building
content: Seva Teerth, part of the Central Vista Project, symbolizes a shift in governance philosophy towards service rather than power, with architecture inspired by Karnataka temples and Buddhist stupas.

title: Madras High Court orders vigilance inquiry into charge of senior advocate having received ‚Çπ50 lakh to pay to a Judge
content: Justice M. Nirmal Kumar also recuses from hearing two cases pertaining to the allegation and instructs the Registry to take the issue to the notice of the Chief Justice

title: Watch: Nation pays tribute to the martyrs of Pulwama terror attack on anniversary
content: The nation solemnly paid tribute to the martyrs of the 2019 Pulwama terror attack on its anniversary, remembering the 40 CRPF personnel who were killed when their convoy was targeted in Jammu and Kashmir.

title: Significant rise in fire accidents in Kozhikode put rescue squads on toes
content: Latest data compiled by the rescue squads point out that around 160 fire outbreaks, including major and minor ones, were reported within the last 30 days in Kozhikode district.

title: BLO arrested on charge of murdering lover's husband in West Bengal
content: BLO Rizwan Hasan Mondal and his accomplice Sagar Gyne were arrested on Friday (February 13) after dismembered body parts of 30-year-old Nasir Ali were found in a canal in Baduria, a police officer said

title: Asaduddin Owaisi takes swipe at Yogi Adityanath over ‚ÄòQayamat‚Äô remark on Babri Masjid
content: Asaduddin Owaisi's remarks come after CM Yogi Adityanath, while addressing a gathering in Barabanki, said, "The day of 'Qayamat' (doomsday) will never come, and hence the Babri structure will never be rebuilt. Those who are dreaming of the day of 'Qayamat' will rot away; that day will never come."

title: Independents, ex-officio members set to decide Mayor, Chairperson races in hung urban bodies
content: Only those Rajya Sabha members and MLCs registered as voters within the concerned municipal or municipal corporation limits would be eligible to be co-opted as ex officio members

title: NEET-PG cut-off revision sparks debate as candidates with single-digit and low scores secure PG seats in top Telangana medical colleges
content: As per the allotment list, more than 20 students who scored between 1 and 100 marks secured postgraduate admissions across government and private medical colleges in the State

title: Duty-bound to wipe out all forms of terrorism from nation: CRPF DG
content: The CRPF top brass, along with senior officers from the army and the Jammu and Kashmir Police, laid floral tributes to the fallen CRPF personnel on the seventh anniversary of the attack

title: Budget has given equal priority for development and welfare of people says JSP leader
content: He said that the allocation of ‚Çπ13,546 crores for the development of roads, ports and airports would benefit the Vizianagaram district, especially in the backdrop of the construction of Bhogapuram international airport.

title: Rahul Gandhi immature, lacks understanding of economy, says Goyal on Congress leader's textile remarks
content: The Congress is frustrated. It has no other scheme or solution except spreading misinformation and fabricated claims, claims Union Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal

title: Andhra Pradesh presents ‚Çπ3.32 lakh crore budget for 2026‚Äì27, prioritises education, welfare and fiscal reforms
content: Finance Minister Payyavula Keshav also proposed the creation of an AP Wealth Fund with a seed corpus of ‚Çπ100 crore, inviting private equity participation to generate long-term wealth for the State

title: Cabinet approves three multi-tracking railway projects
content: These projects include the construction of third and fourth lines between Kasara-Manmad, Delhi-Ambala, and Ballari-Hosapete

title: Cabinet approves ‚Çπ10,000 crore fund for startups to mobilise venture capital, support deep-tech entities
content: The key focus would be on deep tech startups, early growth stage startups through smaller funds, tech-driven innovative manufacturing startups, and sector/stage agnostic startups

title: Gangster arrested after encounter in Haryana‚Äôs Hisar
content: Pawan alias Musa sustained a bullet injury in his leg after the encounter and was admitted to the civil hospital, they said.

title: Part of metro rail pillar collapses in Mumbai's Mulund area; 1 killed and 4 injured
content: The incident took place around 12.20 p.m. on the arterial LBS Road in front of the Johnson and Johnson factory, the official said.

title: Watch: Modi makes historic landing at Emergency Landing Facility in Assam
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated Northeast India‚Äôs first Emergency Landing Facility (ELF) in Dibrugarh, Assam, a 4.2-km dual-use runway built on Moran Bypass. The facility, designed in coordination with the Indian Air Force, can handle fighter jets up to 40 tonnes and transport aircraft up to 74 tonnes.

title: Three CRPF personnel, civilian killed after car rams into stationary truck in Chhattisgarh
content: Four CoBRA personnel, along with the civilian driver, were heading to Raipur from Jagdalpur, the headquarters of Bastar district, to travel to their native places on leave, the official said.

title: Union Cabinet approves converting North and South Blocks into museum
content: Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw said the Cabinet passed a resolution that the new PM Office will now be called as ‚ÄòSeva Teerth‚Äô.

title: Derogatory language against Shankaracharya is verbal violence: Akhilesh Yadav
content: Using highly derogatory language against Shankaracharya is both verbal violence and a sin. Along with the person who said this, those who thumped the tables in flattery will also be guilty, says Samajwadi Party cheif Akhilesh Yadav

title: M.P. government transfers 11 IAS officers in late-night reshuffle; Congress flags move
content: Reacting to the reshuffle, the Madhya Pradesh Congress alleged that corrupt elements were protected in the Excise Department, and it also referred to alleged irregularities in Indore and deaths due to toxic liquor in Jabalpur.

title: Andhra Budget: Launch of Amaravati Quantum Valley at the forefront of deep-tech innovation, says Payyavula Keshav
content: Finance Minister thanked PM Modi for supporting the developing of Amaravati and also initiating the process to introduce legislation to accord statutory status

title: Sharad Pawar discharged from Pune hospital; advised rest for 3-4 days: Supriya Sule
content: The 85-year-old Rajya Sabha member was brought to Ruby Hall Clinic earlier this week from his residence in Baramati town, Pune district, after he complained of difficulty in breathing and a persistent cough

title: Judicial leadership suffers when we pretend judges are perfect: CJI Surya Kant
content: The CJI also called for a radical shift in how judicial leadership is perceived, advocating for the creation of a ‚ÄòCommonwealth Apex Body‚Äô

title: Henley Passport Index: India rises to 75th, loses one visa-free destination
content: Indian passport rose 10 ranks to 75th in the 2026 Henley Passport Index, offering visa-free access to 56 countries

title: PM Modi witnesses IAF aerial show at emergency landing facility in Assam
content: The 4.2-km ELF in Moran ‚Äî the first-of-its-kind in the northeast region ‚Äî was earlier in the day inaugurated by the Prime Minister, who arrived in Assam on a day-long visit

title: Northern Army commander reviews security framework in Kashmir
content: The Army Commander also visited a strategic logistics echelon in Kashmir to review its operational preparedness

title: Over 6.5 kg heroin dropped by drone from Pakistan seized along IB in Jammu
content: The contraband was recovered during a joint operation of the Border Security Force and police in a forward village of the R.S. Pura Sector

title: Shillong-bound aircraft stranded in Kolkata for few hours due to bomb hoax
content: The IndiGo flight 6E 7304 was moved to the isolation bay after the discovery of a handwritten note claiming that a bomb had been placed on the plane, it said.

title: Time, cost of domestic remittances must reduce: Jairam Ramesh
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh noted that while India's remittances from abroad get more policy attention than domestic remittances, this must change due to the volume of domestic remittances as well as their socio-economic profile

title: Minor inside polling booth: Maharashtra SEC orders action against election official, cop
content: A video went viral on social media, which showed a 14-year-old boy, allegedly casting a vote at the Yashwant Nagar polling station in Akluj during the Zilla Parishad and Panchayat Samiti elections on February 7, 2026

title: PM Modi arrives on day-long visit to Assam
content: Modi is also scheduled to witness a 40-minute aerial display by the Indian Air Force (IAF), featuring fighters, transport aircraft and helicopters

title: Water, salt and sugar packs must contain warning on presence of micro or nano plastics: Madras High Court
content: Justices N. Sathish Kumar and D. Bharatha Chakravarthy directs Union Health Ministry and FSSAI to implement their order within four weeks

title: Missing MBA student found dead at friend's house in Indore; foul play suspected
content: While the male friend, her classmate, was untraceable, her father alleged that the man had tried to extort money from her by threatening to circulate her private photographs. The male friend is being treated as the main suspect, said police.

content: During an operation on February 13, 2026, the security personnel also recovered arms and ammunition from the Khulsaibung hill range in Tengnoupal district

title: UFC at the White House explained
content: the event will be the first live professional sporting event on the white house on June 14 . it will be simulcast on CBS and Paramount+ . the announcement of which fighters will compete will continue as the date draws closer . white has credited the president with the idea to stage fights at the nation's capital .

title: How UCLA's softball star decided to join the basketball program
content: MEGAN GRANT has a career .727 slugging percentage, .978 fielding percentage and earned the Big Ten single-season record for home runs with 26 in 2025 . the senior softball star will have weight training, class and softball practice before putting on her jersey .

title: Tiering the 18 non-playoff teams' rebuild timelines
content: we look ahead at how much work teams that were left out of the playoffs must do this offseason . which teams should take a new approach to move toward contender status? which can be in the mix after only a savvy move or two? which could contend sooner rather than later?

title: A supersized Big Mac attack: Grades, takeaways from Canada's 5-1 win over Switzerland
content: a combined final score of 10-1 for the 2026 olympic men's hockey tournament . a pair of famous linemates also hit the scoresheet in this one . the top player of the game, lessons learned, a big question for their final group play game against France .

title: Olympics men's hockey daily: U.S back in action against Denmark
content: Saturday is the fourth day of the men's ice hockey tournament at the 2026 Olympics in Milan Cortina . on Wednesday, Slovakia stunned the hockey world by defeating Finland 4-1 in the first game of the tournament . Saturday marks the return to action for the U.S., which takes on Denmark, as well as Germany-Latvia, Sweden-Slovakia and Finland-Italie .

title: Season preview: Top storylines, POY picks and MCWS predictions
content: our college baseball experts break it all down, plus give some way-too-early predictions for the end of the year . we've got a slew of new head coaches at top programs looking to make their marks early on, like Josh Elander at Tennessee and Chris Pollard at Virginia .

title: Offseason grades for every big move
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . the deal: one-year, $13 million Grade: B This is the signing we all hope for: Justin Verlander going back to the Detroit Tigers .

title: NBA All-Star 2026: Team Vince defeats Team Melo to win Rising Stars championship game
content: this year marks the 75th annual NBA All-Star Game . two teams of U.S. players will face one world team in a round-robin tournament with four 12-minute games . the loser of Game 1 will face Team C in the penultimate game .
